summary: Fixed customer dashboard rendering by: 1) Adding SQL mode fix to disable ONLY_FULL_GROUP_BY (matching admin/vendor pattern), 2) Replacing string class names with actual class imports for better autoloading and type safety, 3) Ensuring all service methods return proper array structures. The dashboard should now render completely without SQL errors or class loading issues.
current_status: Customer dashboard fixes applied. SQL mode configured, class references updated, service methods verified. Dashboard should render completely now.
